items: Made most of the content script features optional to reduce the overhead of the extension when used only for tab management
Made the in-page information panel more handy
Search by name now also searches for update sets
Search by name now takes '*' as a wildcard both at first and/or last positions
Added an information panel in the bottom left of the screen; you can remove it and reenable it from the options page
Added a 'lang' command in the console to quickly switch language, for example 'lang fr'
Changed the colors of the console to match current theme (light or dark)
Added a CodeSearch-like feature in the console, use 'codesearch' of 'cs'
Enhanced the console to make it resizable
Search from the console now shows result previews for users and tasks
Users can be searched by username, employee_number or email
Switch to technical names is now supported in Workspaces
Added a nerdy console to access search faster and new features, check it out in the shortcuts!
Refactored how tab informations are gathered to make the extension popup lighter
You can now search for any number handled by the sys_number mechanism
Updated the popup window to use all available space when larger than 700px
Updated the 'show update set' feature to make it a bit more useful
Enabled tab grouping for Firefox, if API is available
Tweaked the icon coloring feature to keep the original icon shape
Added keyboard shortcuts button with live tooltip showing configured shortcuts
Updated the 'show versions' feature (check your shortcuts!) to open any object incl. flows from designer
Removed the manual theme selection, the extension follows your browser preferences
Made searching for sys_id a lot faster most of the time
Added search for object names, sys_properties, tasks, users, ... Use '*' at the end for a 'STARTSWITH' search
Corrected multiple issues when running the extension is an independant windows
Enhanced search: sys_id or object name, now available as a main toolbar button
Organize tabs into groups with instance colors (when supported by browser)
Light and Dark themes
Background script popup is now using the new UI
Display technical field names now works better
Removed the auto-frame feature because it's implemented by SN now
Corrected a few issues following the manifest version upgrade.
Upgraded manifest to v3. Not a big change from a user point of view but it was such a pain I thought it deserved its own major release.
Not much more, to be honest. Please create issues on github if you see the extension misbehaving.
If you are using extra-service-now.com domains, you may have to re-enable the option, so the extension requests the new, renamed authorization to access all urls.
Finally made some updates required by the recent ServiceNow UI changes.
Updated the documentation search link.
Removed the broadest default permissions for the extension.
important:
You now have to explicitly allow the extension to be used outside of the service-now.com domain. "Enable extra domains for content script" in the options page if you want to use this feature.
Just to be safe, remember you can use the export button in the options page to save your settings into a JSON file. You can import it back later in case of a bug or an issue with sync storage, or to copy your settings accross browsers.
